abigail.name: Abigail
abigail.desc: Abigail is a skilled navigator working under Captain Bugbeard on his ship.

bhezox.name: Bhezox
bhezox.desc: Bezox is a tech CEO who manipulates markets and investments to help the Dragonborns.

binksy.name: Binksy
binksy.desc: Binksy uses magical spray paint with various effects.

bogdan.name: Bogdan
bogdan.desc: Bogdan is the primary muscle of his boss, Grenn.

brundle.name: Brundle
brundle.desc: Brundle uses its compound eyes and many limbs to shoot in every direction simultaneously with ease.

bugbeard.name: Bugbeard
bugbeard.desc: Captain Bugbeard used to be the most fearsome pirate, but a long battle with alcoholism has left him without his sea legs.

duggan.name: Duggan
duggan.desc: Duggan not know much, but he know point cannon and boom.

gack.name: Gack
gack.desc: Gack is a kobold redneck being evicted from his trailer. He blames immigrants, even though the Dragon Council is responsible for his rent doubling.

grenn.name: Grenn
grenn.desc: Grenn owns almost all of the low income housing, thanks to a deal with the Dragons.

hamfast.name: Hamfast
hamfast.desc: Hamfast works hard to keep the tavern's patrons well fed. As a halfling managing an entire tavern kitchen alone, he probably works harder than most. But his boss Grenn probably isn't going to hire any more help any time soon.

hugo.name: Hugo
hugo.desc: Hugo is a troll lumberjack who is hired to begin deforestation of the Cursed Forest.

kem.name: Kem
kem.desc: Kem is a goblin science professor at the academy. He works with Torva.

lafferty.name: Lafferty
lafferty.desc: Lafferty is a Scottish comedian who performs at the tavern every tuesday and thursday night. His routine has begun to get a little stale, so he's thinking about punching up his material a little by making satirical jokes about the Dragon Council.

laggard.name: Laggard
laggard.desc: Laggard is a police officer trying to uncover corruption in his own precinct, but he's too meticulous and slow to get anything done.

mae.name: Mae
mae.desc: Mae is a bard student at the school, and performs violin music in the tavern every Saturday night.

makk.name: Makk
makk.desc: A very popular podcaster who peddles misogyny to thousands of young men.

manto.name: Manto
manto.desc: Manto uses its two scythes to slice down anything in its path.

murhdox.name: Murhdox
murhdox.desc: Murhdox is a media mogul who manipulates public perceptions to help the Dragonborns.

naomi.name: Naomi
naomi.desc: Naomi dances in the tavern on friday nights.

nocturna.name: Nocturna
nocturna.desc: Nocturna is a tiefling barista working the night shift at the local coffee house.

ovina.name: Ovina
ovina.desc: Ovina gives guided tours of the nearby Red Mountains.

pockets.name: Pockets
pockets.desc: Pockets always wears clothing with dozens of pockets.

rhaegan.name: Rhaegan
rhaegan.desc: Rhaegan is the head of the Dragon Council and the major of the town. He has implemented new legislation to make it easier for Dragonkind to siphon all of the town's gold.

rodrik.name: Rodrik
rodrik.desc: As the bartender of the local tavern, Rodrik knows most of the folks in town. If he wants to find out some secret information, he simply stops watering down the target's drinks.

scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.desc: DJ Scratch is a DJ and electronic musician who performs in the tavern on Wednesday nights.

stark.name: Stark
stark.desc: Stark is a werewolf athlete at the academy.

taurus.name: Taurus
taurus.desc: Doc Taurus is a minotaur doctor.

thalassa.name: Thalassa
thalassa.desc: Thalassa is a triton student at the academy and also student body president.

torva.name: Torva
torva.desc: Torva is a kenku alchemist at the academy who works with Kem. He also works part-time as a pharmacist.

uma.name: Uma
uma.desc: Uma is the owlin headmistress of the school. She is always incredibly tired and just wants to read her news scroll with a coffee.

wikus.name: Wikus
wikus.desc: Wikus is a relentless stabbing machine.

willow.name: Willow
willow.desc: Willow is a half-elf working in the tavern.
